Commit 1d5ddd5d44d7bdf80332262c81f9f28dd5a03962 message: "Issue #3491: DetailAst class unclear logic in addChilld method\n\nIssue #3491: DetailAst class unclear logic in addChilld method\n" is invalid
Proper commit message should adhere to the following rules:
    1) Must match one of the following patterns:
        ^Issue #\d+: .*$
        ^Pull #\d+: .*$
        ^(minor|config|infra|doc|spelling): .*$
    2) It contains only one line of text

The rule broken was: 2
